title: Accessible Taipei
feedbackDesc: Please describe the issue or suggestion you encountered and we will improve it as soon as possible.
helpDescription:
User Guide

This application is a test version for the Smart City Node Competition, designed to demonstrate accessible navigation and data handling features.
Currently, the system is for testing and demonstration purposes only; some data, functions, and interfaces are still under development.

1. Purpose
This application simulates accessible guidance in a smart city, using test data to verify system feasibility and operation processes.

2. Data Information
 All test data are for demonstration only and do not represent final results or real data.

3. How to Use
Open the application to access the main screen.
Click the function buttons to browse or interact with the test content.
Some screens will display "This is a test" to indicate the current test phase.

4. Notes
This version is for competition demonstration and functionality verification only and is not a commercial release.
Actual functions and data will be continuously improved in future development stages.
For more information on system principles or technical architecture, please refer to the project technical documentation.
settingDesc: Adjust preferences such as dark mode, language, and font size.
selectAccessible: Please select an accessibility facility type to view
rampDesc: Provides accessible ramps for wheelchair users and strollers, with slopes that meet accessibility design standards.
elevatorDesc: Provides accessible elevators for wheelchair users and people with mobility impairments, equipped with voice prompts and tactile buttons.
toiletDesc: Public restrooms equipped with accessibility features for people with disabilities.
